body.p: The two methods may have similar effects on the income statement, but only by chance or if the number and age distribution of participating employees remain relatively stable over time. There can be significant differences in the measurement of liabilities under the two groups of methods. For these reasons, IASC believed that a requirement to use a single group of methods would significantly enhance comparability.
